creator: dan@cmnz.com
text:
Intermittant core dumps on Solaris 10 (SunOS <myhost> 5.10 Generic_118833-17
sun4u sparc SUNW,Sun-Fire-V240

In error_log:

child pid <PID> exit signal Bus error (10), possible coredump in /my/server/root

creator: rpluem@apache.org
text: This is a php issue. Please open a bug at http://www.php.net/.
